description: [EKANS](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0605) removes backups of Volume Shadow Copies to disable any restoration capabilities.(Citation: Dragos EKANS)(Citation: Palo Alto Unit 42 EKANS)

external_references.description: Dragos. (2020, February 3). EKANS Ransomware and ICS Operations. Retrieved February 9, 2021.
Hinchliffe, A. Santos, D. (2020, June 26). Threat Assessment: EKANS Ransomware. Retrieved February 9, 2021.
